sodium chloride nasal , 1 Spray ( s ) , Each Nostril , QID , Drug Form : Spray , PRN , Start : **DATE[Apr 14 07] 16:10:00
General Results
Today 's results :
ALLRESLTSECT
**DATE[Apr 31 2007] 4:00 AM
Na 143 mEq / L
K 5.0 mEq / L
Cl 109 mEq / L
CO2 22 mEq / L
Anion Gap 12.0
BUN 79 mg / dL Critical High
Cr 5.5 mg / dL Critical High
GFR ( estimated ) 10.00 mL / min / 1.73 m2 Low
( Modified )
Ca 7.9 mg / dL Low
Mg 1.4 mEq / L
Phos 7.1 mg / dL High
NH3 49 uMol / L High
WBC 11.0 X10E+09 / L High
RBC 3.47 X10E+12 / L Low
Hgb 10.4 gm / dL Low
Hct 32.7 % Low
MCV 94.2 fL
MCH 29.9 pg
MCHC 31.8 gm / dL Low
RDW 21.3 % Critical High
MPV 10.8 fL High
Platelets 136 X10E+09 / L Low
Impression and Plan
Plan
1. Heme - h/o SCA .
Admitted in crisis .
On Aranesp .
On Oxycontin TID and prn po / IV Dilaudid .
Palliative Care recommends that the IV Dilaudid be d/c and Dilaudid 10 mg po substituted - will review with attending .
2. Pulmonary - h/o asthma - Duonebs prn ; PNA - Cefepime d/c 'd - completed full course .
On po prednisone - adjusted as needed .
3. HEENT - Group A Strep Throat - Completed 10 day Amoxil course .
Otalgia / including hearing loss - ENT c/s - Floxin Otic - completed course .
Improved hearing .
4. Cardiology - h/o A-Fib .
On Cardizem 60 mg QID - continue to monitor .
5. GI - Hepatic encephalopathy - Lactulose BID .
Monitor ammonia , today 49 ( up from 29 yesterday )
6. Renal - **INITIALS - IV Lasix 80 mg Q AM - monitor CXR .
Appreciate Renal c/s - Renal US - IMPRESSION :
1. ECHOGENIC KIDNEYS COMPATIBLE WITH RENAL PARENCHYMAL DISEASE , WHICH CORRELATES WITH RECENT ABDOMINAL MR FINDINGS .
2. NO HYDRONEPHROSIS .
3. SMALL TO MODERATE PELVIC ASCITES .
On phosLo .
Sodium bicarb prn Na + 143 , K + 5 .
s/p Tunneled Vaxcel HD catheter **DATE[Apr 30 07] .
For HD today .
7. Neurological - Diffuse weakness of extremities .
CT head negative .
PT / OT .
Pt 's strength is improving .
8. Vascular - RUE swelling and pain - RUE doppler preliminarily negative .
9. Prophylaxis - SQ Heparin , interrupted for TDC .
Continue .
10. Heme - Leukocytosis , WBC 11 ( down from 16.5 ) , afebrile .
Patient on steroid therapy .
CXR noted and blood and urine cultures no growth .
C-diff neg .
11. Endocrine - h/o DM - Elevated blood sugars ~ 200 s - consider SSI .
12. Disposition - Pending .
Pt will need SNF placement ( HD ) .
Family contacts :
Daughter **NAME[VVV] **PHONE ( **PLACE ); Mother **PLACE **PHONE ( Arizona ) .
Professional Services

( on **DATE[Apr 31 2007] 15:19 )

( on **DATE[Apr 31 2007] 15:19 )
